<http://feedproxy.google.com/~r/blogspot/hsDu/~3/ael51gAZ_jI/fitness-apps-on-android-wear.html|Fitness Apps on Android Wear>
Posted by <http://google.com/+JBGordon|Joshua Gordon>, Developer Advocate

Go for a run, improve your game, and explore the great outdoors with Android Wear! Developers are creating a diverse array of <https://play.google.com/store/apps/collection/promotion_3000c6c_wear_health_fitness|fitness apps> that provide everything from pace and heart rate while running, to golf tips on your favorite course, to trail maps for hiking.
